item.title: Zuckerberg seeks ‘active role’ in Trump administration tech talks
item.description: Beats being a presidential punching bag.

item.title: Brian Moynihan has some advice for Elon Musk when it comes to running DOGE—but it may not be the Tesla CEO’s style

item.title: Los Angeles’s pivotal 2028 Olympic Games
item.description: Bringing in 15 million visitors to watch more than 15,000 athletes compete in 36 sports requires money, technology and an army of volunteers.

item.title: Spain’s new ‘Big Brother’ travel rules are driving tourists to explore other holiday destinations
item.description: The goal is to boost security and the "fight against terrorism and organised crime". Failure to comply could result in fines of up to 30,000 euros.
